name: Reddit - Dark Side
description:
CREDIT:

If it isnt for srazzano , this theme could not have made it here. Thanks a million srazzano .
Also to gavin19 @ reddit for helping me fix the RES dropdown
I dont know much about CSS and used style 39637 by user 69536 as a base to build this one.
Firebug , Notepad++ , Stylish editor helped me a lot in creating this theme.
